title: Why has Thunderbird started prompting for Caldav at startup?
creator: rousea
content: For the past few days when I open Thunderbird I get a message "https://caldav.one.com is requesting your username and password." (see attachment). I've never signed up for Caldav so I don't have a username or password. If I hit "Cancel" it proceeds as normal. If I enter my email address and log-in password it also proceeds as normal. In either case I have to go through the same process every time I open Thunderbird.

title: Junk Mail Controls do not work with unified folders?
creator: chapf
content:
Is the feature supposed to behave this way? I find this rather tedious. Am I missing something here?

Current behavior:

My installation does not seem to automatically execute spam filtering for unified folders or saved searches. As soon as I manually select one of the included folders within - e.g. an individual mail acccount's inbox - the algorithm triggers and everything works as expected, but only for the one folder I clicked. This leaves me with having to click through all my mail accounts manually to make use of the adaptive junk mail controls function.

Expected behavior:

Selecting a unified folder triggers junk mail controls for all the included folders and moves messages to the respective junk folders automatically.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:147.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/147.0;tb_version:140.7.0;os:Windows 10/11

title: no puedo añadir cuenta correo Yahoo a Thunderbird
creator: gag-trench-outbid
content: Hola Intento añadir una cuenta de correo de Yahoo a Thunderbird y cuando introduzco el usuario y la contraseña me sale siempre el mismo error: "Algo ha ido mal. No hemos podido iniciar tu sesión. Inténtalo de nuevo desde un dispositivo diferente". Mi navegador predeterminado es Brave. Tampoco me deja iniciar sesión desde la web de Yahoo. He probado con Edge y sí puedo hacerlo. Tanto en Thunderbird como en mi navegador (Brave) están habilitadas las cookies de terceros. He probado a cambiar el navegador predeterminado a Edge y tampoco funciona. ¿Cuál es el problema? Un saludo
